summary: A small tribute to the Dot Hack series.
descriptionHtml:
To anyone who has ever played dot hack, you will know this and like me, possibly love it. The game Dot Hack is part based off a poem, created for the game. The poem is entitled \"Epitaph Of Twilight\" So, i took the liberty of copying the poem right onto the blade of the one katana in the normal game.

What it says:

\"Yet to return, the shadowed one.
Who quests for the Twilight Dragon
Rumbles the Dark Hearth,
And Helba, Queen of the Dark[2],
has raised finally her army.
Apeiron, King of Light[2] beckons.
At the base of the rainbow do they meet
Against the abominable Wave,
together they fight.
Alba\'s lake boils.
Light\'s great tree doth fall.
Power- now all to droplets turned
in the temple of Arche Koeln.
Returns to nothing,
this world of shadowless ones.
Never to return, the shadowed one,
Who quests for the Twilight Dragon.\"

Iron Sword Retex:

A small iron sword retex. On the top of the blade it says \"Atoli and Haseo, Eternally Devoted.\" And near the hilt it says, \"Do you know what Honeysuckles represent? Eternal Devotion.\"

All of the text is however backwards.

Also! I\'m looking for modders to help me do retex\'s or other things so that we can build a more Dot Hack Skyrim. Dot Hack just is not given the credit it deserves, and we should change that!

If interested send an email to jacobwingo70@gmail.com
author: AxisDeath
